price: Kuma kada ka sanya hannunka ƙuƙuntacce zuwa ga wuyanka, kuma kada ka shimfiɗa shi dukan shimfiɗãwa har ka zama abin zargi, wanda ake yanke wa.*
arabic: وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ يَدَكَ مَغۡلُولَةً إِلَىٰ عُنُقِكَ وَلَا تَبۡسُطۡهَا كُلَّ ٱلۡبَسۡطِ فَتَقۡعُدَ مَلُومٗا مَّحۡسُورًا
footnotes: * Kada ka zama marõwaci a zarge ka, kuma kada ka zama almubazzari ka rasa mutãne, su yanke daga gare ka.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
